Purpose: Define local replication block requirements for Swordfish conformant implementations.

ReplicaFaultDomain.Purpose: The ReplicaFaultDomain type must be set to Local.

CreateReplicaTarget.Purpose: Ability to reset the system is a core requirement of most users.

ConditionalRequirements.Purpose: Either CreateReplicaTarget or AssignReplicaTarget must be supported in order to advertise local replication support.

AssignReplicaTarget.Purpose: Ability to reset the system is a core requirement of most users.

ConditionalRequirements.Purpose: Either CreateReplicaTarget or AssignReplicaTarget must be supported in order to advertise local replication support.
